mapper.select: SELECT p.user_no AS userNo ,p.podcast_title AS podCastTitle ,p.podCast_subtitle AS podCastSubTitle ,c.category_main AS categoryMain ,(CASE WHEN IFNULL(p.category_no2, '-') = '-' THEN null ELSE c1.category_main END ) AS categoryMain2 FROM podcast p INNER JOIN category c ON p.category_no1 = c.category_no LEFT OUTER JOIN category c1 ON p.category_no2 = c1.category_no
